write_up: Travis Scott has built himself a formidable popular legacy over the course of the decade. He has never been an artistic innovator, borrowing from other artists and producers for the basis of his sound, but still, he created a distinctive style. His lyrics have never been strong, but his syrupy robotic vocals here soar through the bridges and at the end of the day, he comes close to Young Thug’s world, which is a credit to him, considering it’s his song.
lyric: I’m it like a game that get played by a kid
